taskDescription:
Perform database schema validation and fixes:
1. Audit user creation and subscription management operations
2. Verify AI training data storage and retrieval systems
3. Test image generation history persistence
4. Fix any broken database queries identified
workflowContext: Part of system-wide authentication and database audit. Working in conjunction with Victoria's auth testing and Aria's UI verification.

workflowTemplate.name: Authentication System Comprehensive Audit
workflowTemplate.description: Multi-agent collaborative audit of the complete authentication system including security, performance, and user experience validation

agents.taskDescription: Conduct comprehensive authentication system audit including login flows, session management, and security validation
Database validation and optimization for authentication-related tables and queries
UI/UX validation of authentication interfaces and user experience flows

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
- Wait for victoria to complete before starting zara task
- Wait for victoria to complete before starting aria task
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
victoria provides: Authentication flow test results
victoria provides: Session management validation report
zara provides: User authentication table validation
aria provides: Authentication UI component analysis
